CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(success__Business_Area_Override__c), CASE( success__Object__c , "FeedItem", "Chatter", "FeedComment", "Chatter", "Task", "Event / Task", "Event", "Event / Task", "CampaignMember", "Campaign", "OpportunityLineItem", "Opportunity", "OpportunityCompetitor", "Opportunity", "OpportunityContactRole", "Opportunity", "OpportunityTeamMember", "Opportunity", "OrderItem", "Order Product", "CaseComment", "Case", "ContentDocument", "Content", "Product2", "Product", "success__Team_Member__c", "Competition", "success__Metric__c", "Scheduled", "success__Event__c", "External Event", success__Object__c),success__Business_Area_Override__c)
CustomField.label: Business Area
